title: BFFs: The Best of Kara and Scott 2021
description:
This episode takes a look back at 12 months of the most aspirational friendship in podcasting. Kara and Scott review a year's worth of hot takes, bold ideas, jealous fits, civil disagreements, and heartwarming family vacations. Come for the memories, stay for the triggers!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
